com.soa.message

Class MessageErrorCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ErrorCode
      • com.soa.message.MessageErrorCode

  • public class MessageErrorCode
extends ErrorCode
    Constants for pre-defined message oriented error codes.
    Since:
    5.1

      static MessageErrorCode TRANSACTION_NOT_ACTIVE
      Transaction is not currently active.
      static MessageErrorCode UNRECOGNIZED_EXCHANGE_PATTERN
      An invalid exchange pattern was specified.
